pages.text: The $(mob)Plumper$() is an animal found in $(thing)Beaches$(). It slowly wanders around and flees when hit. It can be bred with $(item)Fish$().$(p)Its meat is an excellent and easy to get source of food.

$(mob)Plumpers$() drop $(item)Plumper Blubber$() on death. It can be used as a weak $(item)Furnace$() fuel, or as a substitue for $(item)Tallow$(), $(item)Beeswax$() or $(item)Pressed Wax$() in various recipes.
